description: Upload files to a vCenter datastore

src.description: The file to push to vCenter

datacenter.description: The datacenter on the vCenter server that holds the datastore.

host.description: The vCenter server on which the datastore is available.

path.description: The file to push to the datastore on the vCenter server.

login.description: The login name to authenticate on the vCenter server.

password.description: The password to authenticate on the vCenter server.

validate_certs.description: If C(no), SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be set to C(no) when no other option exists.

datastore.description: The datastore on the vCenter server to push files to.
